item.title: Alpine Adventure Holiday Park
item.desc:
Situated in 20 acres of park like setting, nestled amongst native and exotic forest at the base of Jacks Pass, clean, family environment.
Self contained tourist flats, chalets, kitchen cabins, spacious powered sites and tent sites. Adventure playground & new swimming pool.
Our 40 bed Bellbird Lodge is ideal for family reunions, church, school and sports groups.

item.title: Hanmer Springs Forest Camp
item.desc:
Surrounded by forest and mountains yet only 2.7 kms from the centre of our Alpine Village, the Forest Camp is a wonderful place to get away from it all!
We have a range of cabins, self-catering kitchens, self-contained units and a lodge as well as unpowered tent/campervan sites. An ideal place for families, school camps, groups and our fully accessible units offer facilities for all.

item.title: Hanmer Springs Top 10 Holiday Park
item.desc:
Our Holiday park is nestled amongst trees right in the heart of the village. This central location allows our guests to just relax and enjoy the area without needing to drive anywhere!
Our park is a short walk from the village centre where there is a range of restaurants, cafes, bars and shops.
* Park Motels * Ensuite Units * Cabins * Powered and Tent Sites * Wireless Internet * BBQ Area * Adventure Playground * 3 and 4 wheel bikes * Recreation Room * Sightseeing Bookings * 500m to Thermal Pools & Spa and the Village Centre
Top Experience... always.

item.title: Pines Holiday Park
item.desc:
Situated 600metres from the village and Thermal Pools. Adjacent to golf course, tennis courts and playground.
2 bedroom motels, studio motel and standard cabins. Large tent and power sites surrounded by gardens.
18 hole mini golf within the park. A high standard of hygiene assured.
